text: Mohammed Monwar Hossain (born 30 August 1979) is a Bangladeshi professional association footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Sheikh Russel Dhaka. He also plays for the Mohammedan Jhenaidah, Mahindra United, Mohammedan Dhaka and Brothers Union Dhaka. He is also a member of Bangladesh national football team.http://www.bffonline.com/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi footballers Category:Bangladesh international footballers Category:Bangladeshi expatriate footballers Category:Bangladeshi expatriate sportspeople in India Category:Association football midfielders Category:Mohammedan Sporting Club (Dhaka) players Category:Expatriate footballers in India Category:Footballers at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Sportspeople from Dhaka Category:Asian Games competitors for Bangladesh
title: Mohammed Monwar Hossain
